net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- DeeSix@Lib:FATE -->
<!-- Rolls positive D6 and negative D6 and returns the result between -5 and +5 -->
[H: Positive= 1d6] [H: Negative = 1d6]
<image src='[r: tableImage("GreenD6", Positive)]'></image> &nbsp <image src='[r: tableImage("RedD6", Negative)]'></image> &nbsp [H: Result = Positive - Negative]
<big>= [R: if(Result > 0, "+"+Result, Result)]</big> [H: macro.return = Result]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DeeSix

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- DeeEff@Lib:FATE -->
<!-- Rolls Four FudgeDice and returns the result between -4 and +4 -->
[H: FirstDie = 1dF] [H: SecondDie = 1dF] [H: ThirdDie = 1dF] [H: FourthDie = 1dF]
<image src='[r: tableImage("RedDF", FirstDie)]'></image> &nbsp <image src='[r: tableImage("RedDF", SecondDie)]'></image> &nbsp <image src='[r: tableImage("RedDF", ThirdDie)]'></image> &nbsp <image src='[r: tableImage("RedDF", FourthDie)]'></image> [H: Result = FirstDie+SecondDie+ThirdDie+FourthDie]
<big>= [R: if(Result>0,"+"+Result, Result)]</big> [H: macro.return = Result]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DeeEff

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: switchToken(getSelected())] [H: BoxImage = tableImage("Images",1)] [H: FilledImage = tableImage("Images",2)] [H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")] [frame("TokenSheet"): { Token Sheet
[R: token.name]
[R: token.label] 		[H: DiceMethod = getLibProperty("DiceMethod", "Lib:FATE") ] [H: DiceTable = if( DiceMethod == "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "WhiteDF","WhiteD6")] [R: macroLink("", DiceMethod,"all","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "Ladder@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "GearSheet@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink("Fate Points", "EditFatePoints@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[H: Refresh = json.get(Fate, "Refresh")] [H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [H: Total = if(Current > Refresh, Current, Refresh)] [R, COUNT(Total,""): if(roll.count < Current, "", "")] [R: if(Current > 0 , "   " + macroLink("Spend", "SpendFatePoint@Lib:FATE","all","", currentToken()), "")]
[FOREACH(StressTrack, Stress, "
"), CODE: { [H: Name = json.get(StressTrack, "Name")] [H: Boxes = json.get(StressTrack, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(StressTrack, "Filled")] }]
[R: macroLink("Stress", "EditStressTracks@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink(Name, "TakeStress@Lib:FATE","all",Name, currentToken())] [R, COUNT(Boxes,""): if(roll.count < Filled, "", "")]
[R: macroLink("Aspects", "EditAspects@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Aspect, Aspects, "
"), CODE: { [R: if(Current > 0, macroLink(Aspect, "InvokeAspect@Lib:FATE", "all", Aspect, currentToken()), Aspect)] } ]
[FOREACH(Aspect, TempAspects, "
"), CODE: { [R: if(Current > 0, macroLink(Aspect, "InvokeAspect@Lib:FATE", "all", Aspect, currentToken()), Aspect)] [R: macroLink("(delete)", "DeleteTempAspect@Lib:FATE","all",Aspect, currentToken())] } ]
[R: macroLink("Add A Temporary Aspect","AddTempAspect@Lib:FATE","none","",currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Skill, Skills, ""), CODE: { [H: SkillName = json.get(Skill, "Name")] [H: SkillRank = json.get(Skill, "Rank")] } ]
[R: macroLink("Skills", "EditSkills@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: json.get(Ladder, SkillRank+3)] [R: macroLink(SkillName,"RollSkill@Lib:FATE","all",Skill,currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Stunt, Stunts, ""), CODE: { [H: StuntName = json.get(Stunt, "Name")] } ]
[R: macroLink("Stunts", "EditStunts@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink(StuntName, "UseStunt@Lib:FATE","none",Stunt, currentToken())]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CharSheet

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("EditAspects", "input=1"): { Edit Aspects
[H: count = 0 ] [FOREACH(Aspect, Aspects, "
"), CODE: { } ] [FOR(i, count+1, count+3,1,"
"), CODE: { [H: FieldName = "Aspect"+i] } ]
[H: count = count + 1] [H: FieldName = "Aspect"+count]
    To delete an aspect, blank the field.
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditAspects

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SetAspects@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewAspects = json.remove(macro.args, "Save") ] [H: NumberOfAspects = json.length(NewAspects)] [H: EditedAspects =""] [FOR(AspectNo, 1, NumberOfAspects+1, 1, ""), CODE: { [H: AspectKey = "Aspect"+AspectNo] [H: Aspect = json.get(NewAspects, AspectKey)] [H: EditedAspects = if(Aspect == "", EditedAspects, json.append(EditedAspects, Aspect))] } ] [H: Aspects = EditedAspects] Edited Aspects [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetAspects
CharSheet_CSS

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--SetFatePoints@Lib:FATE-->
[H: Refresh = json.get(macro.args, "Refresh")] [H: Current = json.get(macro.args, "Current")] [H: Fate = json.set(Fate, "Refresh", Refresh, "Current", Current)] Edited Fate points [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetFatePoints

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [H: Refresh = json.get(Fate, "Refresh")] [dialog("EditFatePoints", "input=1; temporary=1; width=100; height=150"): { Edit Fate Points
Refresh
Current

} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditFatePoints

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("EditStress", "input=1"): { Edit Stress
[H: count = 0 ] [FOREACH(StressTrack, Stress, "
"), CODE: { [H: count = count + 1] [H: TrackName = "TrackName"+count] [H: TrackBoxes = "TrackBoxes"+count] [H: TrackFilled = "TrackFilled"+count] [H: Name = json.get(StressTrack, "Name")] [H: Boxes = json.get(StressTrack, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(StressTrack, "Filled")] } ] [FOR(i, count+1, count+4,1,"
"), CODE: { [H: TrackName = "TrackName"+i] [H: TrackBoxes = "TrackBoxes"+i] [H: TrackFilled = "TrackFilled"+i] } ]
Track Name Boxes Filled

    To delete a stress track, blank the name field.
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditStressTracks

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SetStressTracks@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewTracks = json.remove(macro.args, "Save")] [H: NumberOfTracks = json.length(NewTracks)/3] [H: EditedTracks =""] [H: setState("Taken Out", 0)] [FOR(TrackNo, 1, NumberOfTracks, 1, ""), CODE: { [H: TrackNameKey = "TrackName"+TrackNo] [H: TrackBoxesKey = "TrackBoxes"+TrackNo] [H: TrackFilledKey = "TrackFilled"+TrackNo] [H: Name = json.get(NewTracks, TrackNameKey)] [H: Boxes = json.get(NewTracks, TrackBoxesKey)] [H: Filled = json.get(NewTracks, TrackFilledKey)] [H, IF(Filled == Boxes): setState("Taken Out", 1) ; ""] [H: Track = json.set("", "Name", Name, "Boxes", Boxes, "Filled", Filled)] [H: EditedTracks = if(Name == "", EditedTracks, json.append(EditedTracks, Track))] } ] [H: Stress = EditedTracks] Edited Stress Tracks [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetStressTracks

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: setLibProperty("DiceMethod", "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "Lib:FATE")]
[H: setLibProperty("Ladder", "['Abysmal (-3)', 'Terrible (-2)', 'Poor (-1)', 'Mediocre (0)', 'Average (+1)', 'Fair (+2)', 'Good (+3)', 'Great (+4)', 'Superb (+5)', 'Fantastic (+6)', 'Epic (+7)', 'Legendary (+8)']", "Lib:FATE")] [H: setLibProperty("Consequences", "['Mild','Moderate','Severe']")] [H: setLibProperty("WeaponProfile", "['Name', 'Rng', 'Dmg', 'Pen', 'Notes']")] [H: defineFunction("ShellSheet", "CharSheetShell@Lib:FATE")] [H: defineFunction("OwnerSheet", "CharSheetOwner@Lib:FATE")] [H: defineFunction("NotOwnerSheet", "CharSheetNotOwner@Lib:FATE")] [dialog("Splash", "input=0; temporary=1; width=420; height=180"): { Annoying Splash Screen

FATE 3.0
Framework by DrVesuvius
ver 0.95
[R: macroLink("Click Here for all the OGL you can eat", "OGL@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]

}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: onCampaignLoad

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SetSkills@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewSkills = json.remove(macro.args, "Save")] [H: NumberOfSkills = json.length(NewSkills)/2] [H: EditedSkills =""] [FOR(SkillNo, 1, NumberOfSkills+1, 1, ""), CODE: { [H: SkillNameKey = "SkillName"+SkillNo] [H: SkillRankKey = "Rank"+SkillNo] [H: Name = json.get(NewSkills, SkillNameKey)] [H: Rank = json.get(NewSkills, SkillRankKey)-3] [H: Skill = json.set("", "Name", Name, "Rank", Rank)] [H: EditedSkills = if(Name == "", EditedSkills, json.append(EditedSkills, Skill))] } ] [H: SortedSkills = ""] [H, FOR(i,8,-4,-1), CODE: { [H, FOREACH(Skill, EditedSkills): SortedSkills = if(json.get(Skill, "Rank") == i, json.append(SortedSkills,Skill), SortedSkills)] } ] [H: Skills = SortedSkills] Edited Skills [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetSkills

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")] [dialog("EditSkills", "input=1"): { Edit Skills
[H: count = 0 ] [FOREACH(Skill, Skills, "
"), CODE: { [H: count = count + 1] [H: NameKey = "SkillName"+count] [H: RankKey = "Rank"+count] [H: SkillName = json.get(Skill, "Name")] [H: SkillRank = json.get(Skill, "Rank")] } ] [FOR(j, count+1, count+6,1,"
"), CODE: { [H: NameKey = "SkillName"+j] [H: RankKey = "Rank"+j] } ]
Skill Name Rank

    To delete a skill, blank the name field.
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditSkills

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SetStunts@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewStunts = json.remove(macro.args, "Save")] [H: NumberOfStunts = json.length(NewStunts)/2] [H: EditedStunts =""] [FOR(StuntNo, 1, NumberOfStunts+1, 1, ""), CODE: { [H: StuntNameKey = "Name"+StuntNo] [H: StuntDescKey = "Description"+StuntNo] [H: Name = json.get(NewStunts, StuntNameKey)] [H: Description = json.get(NewStunts, StuntDescKey)] [H: Stunt = json.set("", "Name", Name, "Description", Description)] [H: EditedStunts = if(Name == "", EditedStunts, json.append(EditedStunts, Stunt))] } ] Edited Stunts [H: Stunts = EditedStunts] [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetStunts

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("EditStunts", "input=1"): { Edit Stunts
[H: count = 0 ] [FOREACH(Stunt, Stunts, "
"), CODE: { [H: count = count + 1] [H: NameKey = "Name"+count] [H: DescKey = "Description"+count] [H: Name = json.get(Stunt, "Name")] [H: Description = json.get(Stunt, "Description")] } ] [FOR(j, count+1, count+4,1,"
"), CODE: { [H: NameKey = "Name"+j] [H: DescKey = "Description"+j] } ]
Stunt Name
Description
====================================
Stunt Name
Description
====================================
    To delete a stunt, blank the name field.
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditStunts

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: TrackName = macro.args] [H: count = 0] [H: TrackIndex = -1] [FOREACH(Track, Stress,""), CODE: { [H: TrackIndex = if(json.get(Track, "Name") == TrackName, count, TrackIndex)] [H: count = count + 1] }] [H: TrackIndex] [H: Track = json.get(Stress, TrackIndex)] [H: Boxes = json.get(Track, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(Track, "Filled")] [H: flag = input("Damage|0|How many points of "+TrackName+" stress?|TEXT|WIDTH=5")] [H: abort(flag)] [H: Filled = Filled + Damage] [H: Filled = if(Filled > Boxes, Boxes, Filled)] [H: Track = json.set(Track, "Filled", Filled)] [H: Stress = json.set(Stress, TrackIndex, Track)] takes [R: Damage] points of [R: TrackName] stress [R: if(Filled == Boxes, " and is Taken Out", "")]. [H: setState("Taken Out", 0)] [FOREACH(Track, Stress, "
"), CODE: { [H: Boxes = json.get(Track, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(Track, "Filled")] [H, IF(Filled == Boxes): setState("Taken Out", 1) ; ""] } ] [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: TakeStress

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SpendFatePoint@Lib:FATE -->
[H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [H: Fate = json.set(Fate, "Current", Current-1)] spends a Fate point [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SpendFatePoint

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Skill = macro.args] [H: Name = json.get(Skill, "Name")] [H: Rank = json.get(Skill, "Rank")] [H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")] Rolling [R:Name] at [R: json.get(Ladder, Rank+3)]
[R: dice()]
[H: Effort = macro.return] [H: Result = Rank + Effort] [H: Result = if(Result > 8, 8, if(Result < -3, -3, Result))] Result = [R: json.get(Ladder, Result+3)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: RollSkill

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [IF(Current > 0), CODE: { invokes the Aspect "[R: Aspect = macro.args]" [H: Fate = json.set(Fate, "Current", Current-1)] };{ no Fate Points left. Cannot invoke an Aspect. } ] [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: InvokeAspect

Description: [R: Description]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Stunt = macro.args] [H: Name = json.get(Stunt, "Name")] [H: Description = json.get(Stunt, "Description")] [dialog("UseStunt", input="1"): { Use Stunt
Name: [R: Name]
Description: [R: Description]
[R: macroLink("Post Stunt To Chat Window", "PostStunt@Lib:FATE","all",Stunt, currentToken())] } ]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")] [H: Consequences = getLibProperty("Consequences", "Lib:FATE")] [H: AspectTypes = json.merge("['Fragile','Sticky']", Consequences)] [dialog("AddTempAspect", "input=1"): { Add A Temporary Aspect
Type Aspect
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: AddTempAspect

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")] [H:Ranks = json.length(Ladder)] [dialog("LadderSheet", "width=150; height="+(Ranks*32)+"; temporary=1"): { The Ladder [R, FOR(i, Ranks-1, -1, -1, ""), CODE: { } ]
[R: Rank=json.get(Ladder, i)]
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Ladder

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: gains the temporary aspect [H: TempAspect = upper(json.get(macro.args, "TempAspectType"))+": "+json.get(macro.args, "TempAspectName")] [H: TempAspects = json.append(TempAspects, TempAspect)] [H: ShellSheet() ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetTempAspect

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: AspectToDelete = macro.args] [H: DeleteIndex = -1] [H, FOR(i,0,json.length(TempAspects),1,""): DeleteIndex=if(json.get(TempAspects,i)==AspectToDelete, i, DeleteIndex)] [IF(DeleteIndex == -1), CODE: { Aspect Not Found } ; { removes temporary aspect [R: AspectToDelete] [H: TempAspects = json.remove(TempAspects, DeleteIndex)] [H: ShellSheet() ] } ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DeleteTempAspect

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: switchToken(getSelected())] [H: WeaponProfile = getLibProperty("WeaponProfile", "Lib:FATE")] [H, IF(json.contains(Misc, "Weapons")): Weapons = json.get(Misc, "Weapons") ; Weapons = ""] [H, IF(json.contains(Misc, "Gear")): Gear = json.get(Misc, "Gear") ; Gear = ""] [frame("TokenSheet"): { Gear Sheet
[R: token.name]
[R: token.label] 		[H: DiceMethod = getLibProperty("DiceMethod", "Lib:FATE") ] [H: DiceTable = if( DiceMethod == "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "WhiteDF","WhiteD6")] [R: macroLink("", DiceMethod,"all","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "Ladder@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "CharSheetShell@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R, FOREACH(FieldName, WeaponProfile,""): ""] [R, FOREACH(Weapon, Weapons,""), CODE: { [R, FOREACH(FieldName, WeaponProfile,""): ""] } ]
[R: macroLink("Weapons", "EditWeapons@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
"+FieldName+"
"+json.get(Weapon, FieldName)+" [R: macroLink("(delete)", "DeleteWeapon@Lib:FATE","all",Weapon, currentToken())]
[R: macroLink("Add Weapon", "AddWeapon@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Item, Gear, ""), CODE: { [H: Name = json.get(Item, "Name")] } ]
[R: macroLink("Gear", "EditGear@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink(Name, "UseGear@Lib:FATE","none",Gear, currentToken())]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: GearSheet

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:

[H: count = 0 ] [FOREACH(Item, Gear, "
"), CODE: { [H: count = count + 1] [H: NameKey = "Name"+count] [H: DescKey = "Description"+count] [H: Name = json.get(Item, "Name")] [H: Description = json.get(Item, "Description")] } ] [FOR(j, count+1, count+4,1,"
"), CODE: { [H: NameKey = "Name"+j] [H: DescKey = "Description"+j] } ]
Name
Description

    To delete an item, blank the name field.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditGear

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: WeaponProfile = getLibProperty("WeaponProfile", "Lib:FATE")] [dialog("AddWeapon", "input=1; temporary=1; width=250; height=260"): { Add Weapon
[H: count = 0] [FOREACH(WeaponField, WeaponProfile, "
"), CODE: { [H: NameKey= "FieldName"+count] [H: ValueKey= "FieldValue"+count] [H: count=count+1] } ]
[R: WeaponField] [H, IF(WeaponField == "Notes"): BuildString = '' ; BuildString = '' ] [R: BuildString]
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: AddWeapon

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- CreateWeapon@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewWeapon = json.remove(macro.args, "Save") ]
[H: WeaponProfile = getLibProperty("WeaponProfile", "Lib:FATE")] [H: NumberOfFields = json.length(WeaponProfile)]
[H, IF(json.contains(Misc, "Weapons")): Weapons = json.get(Misc, "Weapons") ; Weapons = ""] [H: Weapon = ""] [FOR(FieldNo, 0, NumberOfFields,1,""), CODE: { [H: NameKey = "FieldName"+FieldNo] [H: ValueKey = "FieldValue"+FieldNo] [H: Name = json.get(NewWeapon, NameKey)] [H: Value = json.get(NewWeapon, ValueKey)] [H: Weapon = json.set(Weapon, Name, Value)] } ]
[H: Weapons = json.append(Weapons, Weapon)] [H: Misc = json.set(Misc, "Weapons", Weapons)]
[H, MACRO("GearSheet@Lib:FATE"): "" ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CreateWeapon

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[dialog("EditWeapon", "input=0; temporary=1; width=250; height=140"): { Edit Weapon
The ability to edit multiple weapons at once has not yet been implemented
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EditWeapons

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: OGL

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SetGear@Lib:FATE -->
[H: NewGear = json.remove(macro.args, "Save")] [H: NumberOfItems = json.length(NewGear)/2] [H: EditedGear =""] [FOR(ItemNo, 1, NumberOfItems+1, 1, ""), CODE: { [H: ItemNameKey = "Name"+ItemNo] [H: ItemDescKey = "Description"+ItemNo] [H: Name = json.get(NewGear, ItemNameKey)] [H: Description = json.get(NewGear, ItemDescKey)] [H: Item = json.set("", "Name", Name, "Description", Description)] [H: EditedGear = if(Name == "", EditedGear, json.append(EditedGear, Item))] } ] Edited Gear [H: Misc = json.set(Misc, "Gear", EditedGear)]
[H, MACRO("GearSheet@Lib:FATE"): "" ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SetGear

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: WeaponToDelete = macro.args] [H, IF(json.contains(Misc, "Weapons")): Weapons = json.get(Misc, "Weapons") ; Weapons = ""] [H: DeleteIndex = -1] [H: NoOfWeapons =json.length(Weapons)] [H, FOR(i,0,json.length(Weapons),1,""): DeleteIndex = if(json.equals(json.get(Weapons,i),WeaponToDelete), i, DeleteIndex)] [IF(DeleteIndex == -1), CODE: { Weapon Not Found } ; { removes weapon [R: WeaponToDelete] [H: Weapons = json.remove(Weapons, DeleteIndex)] [H: Misc = json.set(Misc, "Weapons", Weapons)] [H, MACRO("GearSheet@Lib:FATE"): "" ] } ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DeleteWeapon

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: BoxImage = tableImage("Images",1)] [H: FilledImage = tableImage("Images",2)] [H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")]
[R: token.name]
[R: token.label] 		[H: DiceMethod = getLibProperty("DiceMethod", "Lib:FATE") ] [H: DiceTable = if( DiceMethod == "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "WhiteDF","WhiteD6")] [R: macroLink("", DiceMethod,"all","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "Ladder@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]  
You are not the owner of this token.
[FOREACH(StressTrack, Stress, "
"), CODE: { [H: Name = json.get(StressTrack, "Name")] [H: Boxes = json.get(StressTrack, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(StressTrack, "Filled")] }]
Stress
[R: Name] [R, COUNT(Boxes,""): if(roll.count < Filled, "", "")]
Visible Aspects
[R, FOREACH(Aspect, TempAspects, "
"): ""+ Aspect+""]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CharSheetNotOwner

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[frame("GMTools"): { GM Tools Sheet
[H: DiceMethod = getLibProperty("DiceMethod", "Lib:FATE") ] [H: DiceTable = if( DiceMethod == "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "WhiteDF","WhiteD6")] [R: macroLink("", DiceMethod,"all","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "Ladder@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]   [R: macroLink("", "OfferCompel@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
} ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: GMTools

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- CharSheetShell@Lib:FATE -->

[H: switchToken(getSelected())]

[frame("TokenSheet"): {
  <html>
    <head>
      <title>Token Sheet</title> 
      <link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='CharSheet_CSS@[R: getMacroLocation()]'></link>
      <link rel="onChangeSelection" type="macro" href="[R: macroLinkText('CharSheetShell@Lib:FATE', 
'none','','selected')]"></link>
    </head>
    <body>

      [R, IF(isGM()), CODE: { 
        [R: OwnerSheet() ]
      } ; {
        [R, IF(isOwner()): OwnerSheet() ; NotOwnerSheet()]
      } ]

    <body>
  <html>
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CharSheetShell

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: BoxImage = tableImage("Images",1)] [H: FilledImage = tableImage("Images",2)] [H: Ladder = getLibProperty("Ladder", "Lib:FATE")]
[R: token.name]
[R: token.label] 		[H: DiceMethod = getLibProperty("DiceMethod", "Lib:FATE") ] [H: DiceTable = if( DiceMethod == "DeeEff@Lib:FATE", "WhiteDF","WhiteD6")] [R: macroLink("", DiceMethod,"all","", currentToken())] [R: " "+macroLink("", "Ladder@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())] [R: " "+macroLink("", "GearSheet@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())] [R, if(isGM()): " "+macroLink("", "OfferCompel@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink("Fate Points", "EditFatePoints@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[H: Refresh = json.get(Fate, "Refresh")] [H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [H: Total = if(Current > Refresh, Current, Refresh)] [R, COUNT(Total,""): if(roll.count < Current, "", "")] [R: if(Current > 0 , "   " + macroLink("Spend", "SpendFatePoint@Lib:FATE","all","", currentToken()), "")]
[FOREACH(StressTrack, Stress, "
"), CODE: { [H: Name = json.get(StressTrack, "Name")] [H: Boxes = json.get(StressTrack, "Boxes")] [H: Filled = json.get(StressTrack, "Filled")] }]
[R: macroLink("Stress", "EditStressTracks@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink(Name, "TakeStress@Lib:FATE","all",Name, currentToken())] [R, COUNT(Boxes,""): if(roll.count < Filled, "", "")]
[R: macroLink("Aspects", "EditAspects@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Aspect, Aspects, "
"), CODE: { [R: if(Current > 0, macroLink(Aspect, "InvokeAspect@Lib:FATE", "all", Aspect, currentToken()), Aspect)] } ]
[FOREACH(Aspect, TempAspects, "
"), CODE: { [R: if(Current > 0, macroLink(Aspect, "InvokeAspect@Lib:FATE", "all", Aspect, currentToken()), Aspect)] [R: macroLink("(delete)", "DeleteTempAspect@Lib:FATE","all",Aspect, currentToken())] } ]
[R: macroLink("Add A Temporary Aspect","AddTempAspect@Lib:FATE","none","",currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Skill, Skills, ""), CODE: { [H: SkillName = json.get(Skill, "Name")] [H: SkillRank = json.get(Skill, "Rank")] } ]
[R: macroLink("Skills", "EditSkills@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: json.get(Ladder, SkillRank+3)] [R: macroLink(SkillName,"RollSkill@Lib:FATE","all",Skill,currentToken())]
[FOREACH(Stunt, Stunts, ""), CODE: { [H: StuntName = json.get(Stunt, "Name")] } ]
[R: macroLink("Stunts", "EditStunts@Lib:FATE","none","", currentToken())]
[R: macroLink(StuntName, "UseStunt@Lib:FATE","none",Stunt, currentToken())]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CharSheetOwner

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
The GM would like to Compel one of your Aspects. Please ensure your character token is selected and...
..click here to [R: macroLink("Accept", "AcceptCompel@Lib:FATE","all","", currentToken())] and receive a Fate point. or ..click here to [R: macroLink("Refuse", "RefuseCompel@Lib:FATE","all","", currentToken())] and spend a Fate point.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: CompelOutput

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- AcceptCompel@Lib:FATE -->
<!-- AcceptCompel@Lib:FATE -->
[H: closeDialog("OfferCompel")] [H: switchToken(getSelected())] [H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")] [H: Fate = json.set(Fate, "Current", Current+1)] accepts a Compel and receives a Fate point. [H, MACRO("CharSheet@Lib:FATE"): "" ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: AcceptCompel

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: PlayerList = getAllPlayerNames("json")] [dialog("OfferCompel", "input=1; temporary=1; width=175; height=300"): { Offer a Compel
Send To
[R, FOREACH(PlayerName, PlayerList, ""), CODE: { [R: PlayerName]
}]
}] [H: abort(0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: OfferCompel

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- SendCompel@Lib:FATE -->
[H: Name = json.get(macro.args, "Name") ] [H: OutputList = json.set("{}","mlOutputList", json.append("[]",Name))] [H: CallString = macroLinkText('CompelOutput@this', 'list', OutputList)] [R: execLink(CallString)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SendCompel

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- RefuseCompel@Lib:FATE -->

[H: closeDialog("OfferCompel")]
[H: switchToken(getSelected())]
[H: Current = json.get(Fate, "Current")]
[R, IF(Current == 0), CODE: 
{
  does not have any Fate Points to refuse a Compel
} ; {
  [H: Fate = json.set(Fate, "Current", Current-1)]
  refuses a Compel and spends a Fate point.
} ]
[H, MACRO("CharSheet@Lib:FATE"): "" ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: RefuseCompel

net.rptools.CaseInsensitiveHashMap_-KeyV.value: ["STICKY: Covered in carrot juice","MODERATE: Blinded By Science","SEVERE: Chain Smoker","FRAGILE: little mind warped by movie"]
["Big Floppy Ears","Cotton Tail","Goes Like A","They call me Thumper"]
